subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Bob and Mike Bryan earned the United States its first point of a Davis Cup quarterfinal against Spain, beating Marcel Granollers and Fernando Verdasco, 6-7 (7), 6-4, 6-4, 6-4, in Austin, Tex.
snippet: Bob and Mike Bryan earned the United States its first point of a Davis Cup quarterfinal against Spain, beating Marcel Granollers and Fernando Verdasco, 6-7 (7), 6-4, 6-4, 6-4, in Austin, Tex.
